text: Nintendo Music is a music streaming app by Nintendo. The app lets users listen to music from video games made by Nintendo. Users need to have a Nintendo Switch Online subscription to use the app. == Games in Nintendo Music == The music from twenty-three games was available on the app when it released. New games are usually added weekly. List of games with music on Nintendo Music Soundtrack Release date Source Animal Crossing: New Horizons Brain Age: Train Your Brain in Minutes a Day!
